original_text: Moreover Manasseh shed innocent blood very much, till he had filled Jerusalem from one end to another; beside his sin wherewith he made Judah to sin, in doing that which was evil in the sight of the Lord.
korean_text: 므낫세가 유다에게 범죄하게 하여 여호와께서 보시기에 악을 행한 것 외에도 또 무죄한 자의 피를 심히 많이 흘려 예루살렘 이 끝에서 저 끝까지 가득하게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: Moreover Manasseh shed innocent blood very much
sentences.korean_translation: 게다가 므낫세는 무죄한 피를 아주 많이 흘렸고

sentences.original_text: till he had filled Jerusalem from one end to another
sentences.korean_translation: 예루살렘을 한 끝에서 다른 끝까지 채울 때까지

sentences.original_text: beside his sin wherewith he made Judah to sin
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 유다를 범죄하게 한 그의 죄 외에도

sentences.original_text: in doing that which was evil in the sight of the Lord
